name: Alibaba Cloud ApsaraDB RDS instance is using the default VPC
description: This policy identifies ApsaraDB RDS instances which are configured with the default VPC. It is recommended to use a VPC configuration based on your security and networking requirements. You should create your own RDS instance VPC instead of using the default so that you can have full control over the RDS network.
searchModel.query: config from cloud.resource where api.name = 'alibaba-cloud-rds-instance' as X; config from cloud.resource where api.name = 'alibaba-cloud-vpc' as Y; filter '$.X.vpcId equals $.Y.vpcId and $.Y.isDefault is true'; show X;
recommendation:
NOTE: The VPC switching process will interrupt the availability of your instance for 30 seconds. Make sure that your application is configured with automatic reconnection policies.

1. Log in to Alibaba Cloud Portal
2. Go to ApsaraDB for RDS
3. In the left navigation pane, click on 'Instances'
4. Click on the reported instance
5. In the left navigation pane, click on 'Database Connection'
6. In the 'Database Connection' section, click on 'Switch VSwitch'
7. On the 'Switch VSwitch' popup window, Choose custom VPC and Virtual Switch instead of default VPC from the 'Switch To' dropdown list.
8. Click on OK
9. Read the Notes properly and make sure all necessary actions are taken and then Click on 'Switch'
